content: प्रणम् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To bow down, salute, make a low obeisance to, be humble (with <ab>acc.</ab> or dative); न प्रणमंति देवताभ्यः <ls>K. 108</ls>; तां भक्तिप्रवणेन चेतसा प्रणनाम <ls>K. 228</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 27</ls>; <ls>Bg. 11. 44</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 21.</ls> (साष्टांगं प्रणम् ‘to fall down on the eight limbs’; see अष्टांग; दंडवत् प्रणम् ‘to bow by throwing oneself down on the ground quite prostrate and flat like a stick placed horizontally, touching the ground at all points; <ab>cf.</ab> दंडप्रणाम). {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (प्रणमयति) To cause to bow down; तामर्चिताभ्यः कुलदेवताभ्यः कुलप्रतिष्ठां प्रणमय्य माता <ls>Ku. 7. 27.</ls> {@--2@} To bend, incline.
